message.body: Yo dog. Know of any good salvage yards around us? I'm looking for a spare tire.

There's a ton of them in southWest Philly. I got some stuff for my car there. Like Passyunk and Essington Boulevard. Best bet is to google them and then call them and ask if they have exactly what you want. Cause all of them have different cars in them and they'll let you know if it there. you can pull it yourself or some of them will pull it for you but charge more money. You can also haggle price with them.
Yea, I figured they would be down that way. Awesome man, thanks
For the most part they're all pretty much the same. I got a full size spare for my civic, rim and tire complete for 35 bucks. Which is real good.
